Content: 8*n35899a0824*4 many animals have hearts that pump blood through a network of blood vessels. (a) the table below refers to blood flow in the four major blood vessels of the human heart.  if the statement is correct, place a tick (9) in the appropriate box and if the statement is incorrect, place a cross (8) in the appropriate box.(4)name of blood vesselcarries blood away from the heartcarries oxygenated bloodaortavena cavapulmonary arterypulmonary vein (b) humans and fish are both animals that have a heart and a network of blood vessels.  however, there are some differences in their circulatory systems.  the diagrams below illustrate a human circulatory system and the circulatory system in a fish.                    human circulatory system                                            fish circulatory systemthe arrows show the direction of blood flow.bodyheart lungsbodyheart gills
